postBody: Have you ever really thought about the anatomy of a flower? I love the stem as it is the vessel that provides the flower with so much life.
Serious question!!! If you had to choose between roses or marigolds for the rest of your life, which would you choose?  I would go with roses as the are the embodiment of love.
I am having MAJOR issues with my cactus plant. I only water it once a week, but it is behaving as if it has been overwatered.  I have had the plant for 2 years and I am worried.
We spend so much time here talking about flowers and trees, but what about mosses?  Have any of you ever cared for a moss?  I am thinking of purposely growing moss this summer.
I wanted to start a discussion about the right way to start a garden.  I have some pumpkin seeds I want to test out in my virgin garden.  Does anyone have experienc with this?
